CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 17, 1962, page 1, reads: "Drive For Teachers - Ashton Allen (center) and Dr. Wade Wilson, right, are shown receiving the greetings of Dr. Thomas J. Kelly, president of the West Mifflin School Board, shortly after Allen told the board, 'Now's the time to hire Negro teachers.' Dr. Kelly, in behalf of the board, thanked Allen and Dr. Wilson for appearing before the board. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: President of West Mifflin School Board Dr. Thomas J. Kelly shaking hands with Ashton Allen and Dr. Wade Wilson, in office with TWA calendar on wall
